title: Impact of COVID-19 on Mental Health
itunes:title: Impact of COVID-19 on Mental Health
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Investment Bank Analyst Alison Williams breaks down Morgan Stanley's earnings and outlook. Dr. Laura Murray, Senior Scientist at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses the public and mental health aspects related to COVID-19. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Tech Reporter Austin Carr share their insight on Carnival’s negligence amidst the coronavirus outbreak. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Lananh Nguyen talks about Wall Street leaders warning of deep unemployment and a long shutdown. And we Drive to the Close with Mitch Rubin, Chief Investment Officer at RiverPark Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
